answers.answer: I have a friend that was told her baby was going to weigh a certain amount (i forgot exactly) and the baby weighed about a pound less so it maybe a bit of a difference but not that much but also keep in mind most babies when they are born the lose a little
I have been told by alot not to go by it, but I think it will be close, my daughter was 9 pound 6 when she was born. Plus having gestational diabetes with my boy, will most prob make him bigger hey?
Maybe just because he is a boy does not guarantee he will be bigger but maybe
Its usually half a pound give or take
Na I mean having gestational diabetes, not that he's a boy.

question: So I'm 36+ 2 days pregnant, yesterday I had my growth scan and they said my baby boy is already around 8 pound 11. I'm only going to 39 weeks as I'm having a c section. They say babies put on 1/2 a pound each week now. So I'm looking at roughly a 10 pounder roughly. Has anyone had this done and they have been wrong or spot I'm with the weight.
title: growth scan
